Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via: 55th, Ashland, 59th, Racine and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Ashland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via: 55th, Ashland, 59th, Racine and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier police activity at Clark/Division. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays & congestion following earlier police activity at Clark/Division.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
